snippet.title: Official trailer for "Square Saga: The Trials" video game.
snippet.description:
Square Saga: The Trials is part 1 of the Square Saga.  Experience frantic, old-school arcade action as you fight to the death as a Square warrior at the behest of your Spherical overlords.

Play the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2770270/Square_Saga_The_Trials/

Check out the website: https://www.squaresaga.com

See more videos  @squaresaga 

2024 Copyright, NAUGHTYROBOT Game Studio, All Rights Reserved
